full_summary:
### Solicitation for Hardware Maintenance and Support Services for X86 Dell Products

#### Solicitation Number and Details
* Solicitation Number: SSC-23-00024832:T
* Solicitation Title: Hardware Maintenance and Support Services for X86 Dell Products
* Closing Date: January 11, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)

#### Requirements
Shared Services Canada (SSC) requires the provision of Hardware Maintenance and Support Services for X86 Dell Products. This solicitation contains a security requirement, and the contractor must comply with relevant trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and several free trade agreements.

#### Terms and Conditions
* Bidder inquiries: Send emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* P2P Portal access: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public) under Solicitation List: BPM020315 Hardware Maintenance and Support Services for X86 Dell Products

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: December 13, 2023
* Closing Date: January 11, 2024 @ 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)
* Security requirement: Bidders must comply with relevant security requirements.

#### Contact Information
* Contact Person: Eric Lavinge
* Phone Number: 343-541-8756
* Fax Number: 613-960-6026
* Email: No email provided
* Address: 180 Kent Ottawa, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
The solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Note: This rewritten text excludes any extraneous information and
